channel.title: Not many people have this
channel.description:
Well, I am making two worlds, each one have the exact same features but, I need to know one thing.
If I log into world 2, all the member items E.g Whip would be named Member, how would I do this, or would I have to go through the Item.cfg ?
I am only doing this for a friend, he needs it and doesn't have the slightest clue about Java.

item.title: Not many people have this
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

huh what do you mean?

u mean how to make items called member item? and when a member wears it says the real name or you mean somthing like that some items only can be equiped by members , that one i know how. for the other one pm me and il figer it out for you.
for equiping i made a fast tut.
open ur client.java control+f
and look for

	public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

and under this

if(wearID == 5509){ emptySmallPouch(); return false; } paste your own code so it wil look like this

if(wearID == 13654 && (donator != 1)) { // sM("you need to be a donater to wear this"); return false; } so this means when a non donater trys to equip it wont work

NOTE:: u need to have donater able , or if u use like member then change the (donator != 1)) to (member != 1)) or whatever u use. if u didn’t do that , look for a gudie there are serval guides here and on runlocus.

reverce.

Read full topic
